alert.note: Alert for Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 4:41PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Judith Basin and south central Fergus Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 440 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Moore, or 22 miles southwest of Lewistown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buffalo and Garneill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
